Uses of Class
com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice.DatabaseServiceListener

  • Packages that use DatabaseServiceListener 
    Package Description
    com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice
    Provides the interface and associated classes for defining a database service which is a service that appears on the left-hand side of the main Geneious window and provides the user with access to a database, for example NCBI or the local database for storing the user's documents.

    • Uses of DatabaseServiceListener in com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice

      Methods in com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice that return types with arguments of type DatabaseServiceListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected List<DatabaseServiceListener> DatabaseService.getDatabaseServiceListeners()
      The default implementations of DatabaseService.addDatabaseServiceListener(DatabaseServiceListener) and DatabaseService.removeDatabaseServiceListener(DatabaseServiceListener) store the listeners in a list that is available for subclasses using this method.
      protected List<DatabaseServiceListener> WritableDatabaseService.getDatabaseServiceListeners()
      Get all DatabaseServiceListeners added using WritableDatabaseService.addDatabaseServiceListener(com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice.DatabaseServiceListener).
      Methods in com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice with parameters of type DatabaseServiceListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DatabaseService.addDatabaseServiceListener(DatabaseServiceListener listener)
      DatabaseServiceListener has several methods for the database service to notify the program of changes.
      void WritableDatabaseService.addDatabaseServiceListener(DatabaseServiceListener listener)
      A sub-class must not override this, but should instead use WritableDatabaseService.getDatabaseServiceListeners() as this class relies on WritableDatabaseService.getDatabaseServiceListeners().
      void DatabaseService.addWeakDatabaseServiceListener(DatabaseServiceListener listener)
      Like DatabaseService.addWeakDatabaseServiceListener(DatabaseServiceListener) but adds a weakly referenced listener instead.
      void DatabaseService.removeDatabaseServiceListener(DatabaseServiceListener listener)
      Remove a listener which was added using DatabaseService.addDatabaseServiceListener(DatabaseServiceListener) or DatabaseService.addWeakDatabaseServiceListener(DatabaseServiceListener)

      .
      void WritableDatabaseService.removeDatabaseServiceListener(DatabaseServiceListener listener)
      A sub-class must not override this, but should instead use WritableDatabaseService.getDatabaseServiceListeners() as this class relies on WritableDatabaseService.getDatabaseServiceListeners().
